rows.label: qst200232_msg0001
rows.name: You understand now, right!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0002
rows.name: Justice absolutely never loses!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0003
rows.name: Wait, he can't hear me[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200232_msg0004
rows.name:
N-no way[ML:Dash ] Something like this
happened because of me[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200232_msg0005
rows.name:
Don't look away! Look firmly
at what you've done!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0006
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Even though I just wanted to
cure my mother's illness and
let her live an easy life.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0007
rows.name: Why did it become like this[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200232_msg0008
rows.name:
Your pure feelings[ML:Dash ] were
taken advantage of.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0009
rows.name:
Harghal's pure feelings[ML:Dash ] were taken
advantage of, weren't they.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0010
rows.name:
Pure feelings[ML:Dash ] They were
taken advantage of.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0011
rows.name:
Harghal's pure feelings. They
were taken advantage of.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0012
rows.name: To cure my mother's illness[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200232_msg0013
rows.name:
I convinced myself that anything
would be justified if the purpose
was to save my mother[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200232_msg0014
rows.name:
There's no way I can be forgiven
for causing something like this[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200232_msg0015
rows.name: I can only die and apologize!!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0016
rows.name: You idiot!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0017
rows.name:
There's no way you can take
responsibility by dying!
Have a stronger heart!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0018
rows.name:
Bear this sin, atone for it,
and live to help many people.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0019
rows.name:
That is surely what Harghal's
mother and Couche desire, right?

rows.label: qst200232_msg0020
rows.name: Come on, look forward!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0021
rows.name:
If Harghal truly desires that,
I'll atone together with you!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0022
rows.name: Uu[ML:Dash ] Uuuu[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200232_msg0023
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]I'm sorry. Really, thank you[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200232_msg0024
rows.name:
Sticking to justice is also
a tough thing, isn't it.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0025
rows.name:
Justice is just one word when you
say it, but it's a difficult thing.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0026
rows.name: Justice[ML:Dash ] A heavy word.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0027
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]It's heavy, that thing called justice.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0028
rows.name:
That's not true. Actually,
it's a simple thing.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0029
rows.name:
But, everyone thinks about
it too difficultly and loses
sight of the essence.

rows.label: qst200232_msg0030
rows.name:
That's why, so that everyone
doesn't get lost, we have
to firmly build a path!

rows.label: qst200232_msg0031
rows.name:
I'm counting on you from
here on too!! Partner!
